name: Mother Gaïa
description:
Put yourself into godess Gaia's shoes and protect yoursefl against the impurities brought by the ungratefull manking:

Smokey, the embodiment of air pollution

Tirer, a monster born from an abandonned car

Trashcant and their king, Trashcannot, this is what happens when you leave your trash randomly

Defeat them and return to your original state of a healthy world, or perish in the attempt.

How To Play:

  • Q: Go left
  • D: Go right
  • Space: Jump
  • Right mouse click: Shoot
  • Left mouse click: Change weapon
  • Z + Mouse click: Secondary weapon

Team: EtibeCorp

  • Raphael Turpin
  • Tessy Grondin
  • Leo Sautron
  • Nathan Maillot
  • Mattis Dalleau
